name: absorb
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.sword-shield: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user attacks by draining the target’s nutrients. Some of the damage dealt to the target is absorbed by the user to restore their own HP.
